db_record.REQUESTJSON: {"kibana.alert.rule.name": "Multiple Alerts in Different ATT&CK Tactics on a Single Host", "@timestamp": "2025-09-25T10:11:16.668Z", "kibana.alert.workflow_status": "open", "kibana.alert.reason": "event created high alert Multiple Alerts in Different ATT&CK Tactics on a Single Host.", "kibana.alert.severity": "high", "kibana.alert.rule.description": "This rule uses alert data to determine when multiple alerts in different phases of an attack involving the same host are triggered. Analysts can use this to prioritize triage and response, as these hosts are more likely to be compromised.", "_id": "d98e633f0354de6ff73342fad69b2705045d909052beb5efd6fa53e80721c313", "_relevance_score": 1.0}

original_alert_details.kibana.alert.rule.name: Multiple Alerts in Different ATT&CK Tactics on a Single Host
original_alert_details.kibana.alert.reason: event created high alert Multiple Alerts in Different ATT&CK Tactics on a Single Host.
original_alert_details.kibana.alert.rule.description: This rule uses alert data to determine when multiple alerts in different phases of an attack involving the same host are triggered. Analysts can use this to prioritize triage and response, as these hosts are more likely to be compromised.
